item.title: How to give kids autonomy? 'Anxious Generation' author says a license to roam helps
item.description: Kids have too much screen time and not enough autonomy, says author Jonathan Haidt. His book The Anxious Generation argues this has caused an epidemic of mental illness and suggests ways to fix it.
item.content:encoded: Kids have too much screen time and not enough autonomy, says author Jonathan Haidt. His book The Anxious Generation argues this has caused an epidemic of mental illness and suggests ways to fix it.

item.title: Chicago shooting kills 7-year-old girl and wounds 7 people including small children
item.description: Eight people were shot including a young girl who was killed in what Chicago police believe was gang-related violence on the city's South Side on Saturday night.

item.title: These Mormon women are rejecting Trump, fraying GOP support in a key state
item.description: In this swing state, every voting bloc can make a difference. That includes Maricopa County's LDS community, where Republican women have been turning away from former President Donald Trump.

item.title: Police in Australia identify the Sydney stabbing attacker who killed 6 people
item.description: Police have identified the assailant who stabbed six people to death at a busy Sydney shopping center before he was fatally shot by a police officer.

item.title: Faith Ringgold, quilt and visual artist, dies at 93
item.description: Known best for her story quilts depicting African-American experiences and feminine life, she also created paintings, sculpture and children's books. She was 93.

item.title: Israel shoots down missiles and drones after Iran launches unprecedented attack
item.description: Sirens sounded across Israel overnight as Israeli officials urged residents to take shelter. The attack follows a vow of retaliation from Iran after an earlier strike on an Iranian consulate in Syria.
